Test Name: Hereditary Erythrocytosis Gene Panel, Next-Generation Sequencing
Purpose: To identify genetic variants associated with hereditary erythrocytosis through next-generation sequencing and bioinformatic analysis.
Equipment: Next-generation sequencing instrument (e.g., Illumina sequencer) and associated bioinformatics tools (BWA, Bowtie, Picard, SAMtools, GATK, FreeBayes)
